overview: Older, wiser, funnier and far closer to a full breakdown, Cruttenden certainly has an edge to him, perhaps itâ€™s from existing on the edges of things; the edges of London, the edge of middle-age, the edge of middle-class and the edge of greater fame. He has all the likeability of an arena comic but with something of the night about him.
title: Hal Cruttenden Live: Tough Luvvie
